game.name: Jurassic Park Classic Games Collection
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: HOLD ON TO YOUR BUTTS! THE 8-AND 16-BIT ERA OF JURASSIC PARK GAMES HAS RETURNED, COMMEMORATING 30 YEARS OF THE ICONIC FILM!
game.shortDescriptionEn: HOLD ON TO YOUR BUTTS! THE 8-AND 16-BIT ERA OF JURASSIC PARK GAMES HAS RETURNED, COMMEMORATING 30 YEARS OF THE ICONIC FILM!

reviewHighlights.text: As a real Jurassic Park fan i cannot let this one slip by...haven't played all of them yet, but some like the 8bit version i did play as a kid and it'...
not a good port, game breaking bugs make it unplayable.
